name: BruhCirc Alpha 0.2
description:
Welcome to BruhCirc Alpha 0.2

!!!New Features!!!

Purple Enemy (Spawns at 500 huntpoints)

2 new weapons

Shopping System

particles

Bug Fixes (Score system)

High Score and Score system is removed from the game but now there are huntpoints

you get them by killing enemies (every enemy gives you different amount of huntpoint) and then you can use huntpoints to buy new weapons.

When you die everything resets (you lose your huntpoints, weapons)

Bugs

Some GUI bugs

Shopping system bugs
